short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access free file converter services, news and shopping websites, plus free web search, right from your new tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access file converter websites and services, as well as quick-links to news, email and shopping websites, right from your New Tab.
This extension configures your New Tab page to DownloadConverterFree to provide these features.

This tool contains links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by or in any way affiliated with our company or this product. Please note that our company or this tool does not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites. For more information visit our Terms of Use page listed below.

Use the web search facility to search for file converters and more.

You will also be prompted with quick-links to file converter websites for your convenience!

Adjust your experience with this extension in the settings widget at the bottom-right of your New Tab page.

Click the "About" menu item in the extensions browser action to read through our permissions and why they're needed to give you the best New Tab experience.

By installing our product, you agree to the EULA and Privacy Policy, links to which can be found below. Feel free to uninstall should you no longer want our product.
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.downloadconverterfree.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.downloadconverterfree.com/terms.html
Policy - https://www.downloadconverterfree.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.downloadconverterfree.com/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
